a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Population-weighted average level of exposure to concentrations of suspended particles measuring less than
2.5 microns in diameter. Exposure is measured in micrograms per cubic metre (µg/m³).
PM2.5 exposure in 2017 (micrograms per cubic meter)
PM2.5 exposure in 1990 (micrograms per cubic meter)
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024)
